LanguageData.AteTwistedMeat.stages.ate_twisted_meat.d: It was so gristly and stringy - like eating cancer. I want to throw up.
LanguageData.BecameGhoul.stages.became_a_ghoul.label: {0} became a ghoul
LanguageData.BecameGhoul.stages.became_a_ghoul.descri: That vacant lookâ€¦ Are they even in there anymore?
LanguageData.Chimera.stages.observed_chimera.label: observed chimera
LanguageData.Chimera.stages.observed_chimera.descript: That misshapen creature, the cracked whorled flesh... horrifying.
LanguageData.ClosedTheVoid.stages.closed_the_void.des: I can't believe it's finally over.
LanguageData.DarknessLifted.stages.unnatural_darkness: It's finally gone! I can breathe again.
LanguageData.HealedMe.stages.healed_me.label: healed me
LanguageData.MutatedMyArm.stages.mutated_my_arm.label: mutated my arm
LanguageData.PlayedWithCube.stages.cube_joy.label: cube joy
LanguageData.PlayedWithCube.stages.cube_joy.descripti: My wonderful cube. My precious cube. I love it. It's so beautiful.
LanguageData.PsychicRitualGuilt.stages.guilt-0.label: {RITUAL} guilt
LanguageData.PsychicRitualGuilt.stages.guilt-0.descri: It feels wrong to have participated in that ritual.
LanguageData.PsychicRitualGuilt.stages.guilt-1.label: {RITUAL} guilt
LanguageData.PsychicRitualGuilt.stages.guilt-1.descri: That ritual was a crime against its victim. I shouldn't have been there.
LanguageData.PsychicRitualGuilt.stages.guilt-2.label: {RITUAL} guilt
LanguageData.PsychicRitualGuilt.stages.guilt-2.descri: That ritual was nothing short of torture. It's evil!
LanguageData.PsychicRitualVictim.stages.psychic_ritua: They used me for their twisted ceremony. I'll never forget that horrid chanting.
LanguageData.UnnaturalCorpseDestroyed.stages.unnatura: I can still feel the corpse. It's out there. It's thinking of me. It hates me.
LanguageData.VoidCatharsis.stages.void_catharsis.desc: There was a madness building in my mind. It's gone, for now.
LanguageData.VoidClosed.stages.void_closed.label: void closed
LanguageData.VoidClosed.stages.void_closed.descriptio: We can sleep easier now. Those things won't be coming back any time soon.
LanguageData.VoidCuriosity.stages.Void_curiosity.desc: We should perform a void provocation ritual. Who knows what phenomena we might discover?
